lead_paragraph: The justice ruled that the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission could encourage electricity users to adopt “demand response” programs.

headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Upholds Efforts on Managing Electricity Use Through Pricing
headline.main: Supreme Court Upholds Efforts on Managing Electricity Use Through Pricing

snippet: The justice ruled that the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission could encourage electricity users to adopt “demand response” programs.
abstract: Supreme Court rules Federal Energy Regulatory Commission can encourage electricity users like hospitals, schools and shopping malls to cut consumption at peak times in exchange for price cuts.
